content:
"Project Catalyst" is also the name of an initiative by the Cardano blockchain platform. The goal of this project is to provide a decentralized funding mechanism for the development of the Cardano ecosystem. The funding mechanism is based on a treasury system, where a portion of the block rewards are set aside for community proposals.

The Project Catalyst is a decentralized autonomous organization (DAO) that allows the Cardano community to propose and vote on funding proposals for the development of the Cardano ecosystem. Proposals can be submitted by anyone in the community, and are then evaluated and voted on by a group of elected community representatives known as "treasury witnesses". Funding is allocated based on the outcome of these votes, with the goal of supporting projects that will have the greatest positive impact on the Cardano ecosystem.

It's an on-chain governance system for the Cardano blockchain that allows for community members to propose, vote and fund development projects that align with the Cardano's vision. It utilizes a treasury system where a portion of the block rewards are set aside for community proposals.
